pkgmetadata.longdescription: Dictalchemy===========Dictalchemy adds asdict() and fromdict() methods to SQLAlchemy declarative models.Documentation-------------Documentation can be found at `http://pythonhosted.org/dictalchemy/ <http://pythonhosted.org/dictalchemy/>`_Source------The source is hosted at `http://github.com/danielholmstrom/dictalchemy <http://github.com/danielholmstrom/dictalchemy>`_.Licence-------Dictalchemy is MIT licenced.
